footer.description: We offer a wide range of cars with great service and fair prices.

about.subtitle: Over 5 years importing and selling cars
about.whyText: Competitive prices, quality service, and safe deals. Our experts help you pick the car of your dreams.
about.contactSubtitle: Ready to answer all your questions
about.ctaReady: Ready to find your dream car?

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Buying with us is profitable and safe
services.whySubtitle: Your reliable partner in car import
services.ctaText: Contact us and we’ll guide you through the process

stepsDetailed.title: Choose a car
stepsDetailed.description: Personal selection and cost breakdown with our experts.

stepsDetailed.title: Pay deposit
stepsDetailed.description: 15% of auction price, minimum 500,000 ֏, refundable until purchase.

stepsDetailed.title: Check history
stepsDetailed.description: We check the vehicle history (autocheck, carfax) before bidding.

stepsDetailed.title: Join auction
stepsDetailed.description: Bid from our office or online and buy within your budget.

stepsDetailed.title: Sign contract
stepsDetailed.description: We fix final Armenia price, payment stages, and obligations.

stepsDetailed.title: Land transport
stepsDetailed.description: Transport to port; we provide extra photos on arrival.

stepsDetailed.title: Insurance
stepsDetailed.description: Transport insurance (A Class) via leading local insurers.

stepsDetailed.title: Sea shipping
stepsDetailed.description: Container loading with tracking via container number.

stepsDetailed.title: Customs
stepsDetailed.description: Unloading and customs clearance with our broker and team.

stepsDetailed.title: Handover
stepsDetailed.description: Cleared vehicle delivered to you with a sale contract.

benefitsDetailed.title: Competitive prices
benefitsDetailed.description: Best market prices with no hidden fees.

benefitsDetailed.title: Support 24/7
benefitsDetailed.description: Always ready to answer your questions.

benefitsDetailed.title: Fast delivery
benefitsDetailed.description: Optimized timelines along the whole route.

benefitsDetailed.title: Personal approach
benefitsDetailed.description: Every client gets a dedicated manager.
